name: Night Detective: Decrepit Manor
storyline: The owner of Darkwood Manor has gone missing. Can the Night Detective get to the bottom of the mystery before something sinister happens? This mysterious tale is just getting started, are you ready detective?
summary: Night Detective: Decrepit Manor is a retro styled and retro inspired point-and-click adventure. Solve the mystery of the Decrepit Manor by following clues, examining objects, and finding new items to help you through the manor.
